vote.title: Authorize an increase in the purchase amount for the acquisition of three tracts of land containing a total of approximately 25 acres located near the intersection of Faithon P. Lucas, Sr. Boulevard and Scyene Road located in Dallas County from Ashley Furniture Industries, Inc. for the Southwest 120/96-inch Water Transmission Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $579,419.00, increased from $1,184,890.00 ($1,172,046.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $12,844.00) to $1,764,309.00 ($1,751,465.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $12,844.00) - Financing: Water Construction Fund
vote.description: Authorize an increase in the purchase amount for the acquisition of three tracts of land containing a total of approximately 25 acres located near the intersection of Faithon P. Lucas, Sr. Boulevard and Scyene Road located in Dallas County from Ashley Furniture Industries, Inc. for the Southwest 120/96-inch Water Transmission Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $579,419.00, increased from $1,184,890.00 ($1,172,046.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $12,844.00) to $1,764,309.00 ($1,751,465.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $12,844.00) - Financing: Water Construction Fund
